## Welcome to my personal website!!

![](https://media.giphy.com/media/k3kqJ2d8cUvSM/giphy.gif?cid=790b7611cv6b4upvgmben210i123oa31qyhd9x6on72zqi0z&ep=v1_gifs_search&rid=giphy.gif&ct=g)

My name is Mia Isaacs and I'm a second-year MPH student at Columbia University studying epidemiology with a certificate in Applied Biostatistics and Public Health Data Science.

This website was made for the Data Science I course (P8105) at the Mailman School of Public Health. 

Click [here](experience.html) for more information about my educational and professional experience.
